ru:
• ● This is a team event (minimum 1 member, maximum 3 members in a team).
  • ● Theme of the event will be announced on spot.
  • ● Designing prototype should be done in figma within a duration of 1 hour, and 5 mins to think over the theme.
  • ● The participants should bring their own devices to sketch their design.
  • ● The design should be original & worked from scratch.
  • ● Plagiarism or Copy of work/template shall be prohibited.
  • ● Decisions by the committee judges shall be final.

de: Prepare for an intense online chess battle in our RIVALS GAMBIT. This tournament features thrilling rounds of rapid chess, designed to test your strategic thinking and speed. Compete against fellow chess enthusiasts, showcase your skills, and claim victory in this online arena.
catchy_de: Ready for a digital chess duel? Join RIVALS GAMBIT for two rounds of strategic warfare! From calculated rapid games to lightning-fast blitz battles, only the sharpest minds will prevail. Even if you don't take home the crown, you'll experience the thrill of online competition and the joy of playing chess!
ca: Join the battlefield of minds in this chess showdown!

de: Get ready for the ultimate battle royale showdown at TECHVISTA 2025! Compete against top squads, showcase your strategy, teamwork, and combat skills, and fight for glory and exciting prizes. Whether you're a pro or a passionate gamer, this electrifying esports event is your chance to dominate the battlegrounds!
catchy_de: Gear up for the most thrilling BGMI tournament at TECHVISTA 2025! Compete against top squads, showcase your strategy, and battle for exciting prizes!
ru: • Fair Play & Integrity – Any form of cheating, hacking, teaming, or exploiting game bugs/glitches is strictly prohibited and will result in immediate disqualification. Device Restrictions – The use of emulators, unauthorized third-party apps, or cheat tools is not allowed and will lead to disqualification. Respect & Sportsmanship – Players must maintain respectful conduct at all times. Abusive language, offensive usernames, inappropriate behavior, or taunting knocked-out players will result in penalties or disqualification. Match Conduct & Connectivity – Players are responsible for ensuring a stable internet connection. Matches will not be restarted due to individual lag, disconnections, or technical issues on a player's end. Play fair, follow the rules, and enjoy the competition!
